__TOC__


We need to write up test-cases for all of the default desktop applications, at a minimum (other common applications welcome as well).  If you are familiar with an application, please click its name and improve the list of testcases.  If the testcase page doesn't exist yet, choose the "Application``Testing/Page``Template" template.  Be specific with your instructions for testing.  If there is an application you think should be added to the list, please add it using the format you see for the others.

To catch regressions as quickly as possible, each application should be tested often during development cycles.  Report any bugs found while testing.

=== Default GNOME/Ubuntu & XFCE/Xubuntu ===
